extensionDescription.message: Browser extension that automatically monitors for passwords that are compromised

extensionDeveloperName.description: The name of the extension's developer

extensionDeveloperURL.description: The URL of the extension's developer

contextMenuOptionsTitle.description: The name of 'Options' in the context menu

toolbarIconPasswordCompromisedTitle.description: The title of the toolbar icon when a compromised password is detected

notificationThisIsTheCompromisedPassword.description: The text in the notification that displays the unmasked password

notificationPasswordCompromisedText.message:
Warning! This password has been included in data breaches.

Click to see the unmasked password.

notificationExpired.description: The text shown when the notification is clicked after expiry

popupCompromisedDescription.message:
The password you used on this page has been detected in leaked databases.
It is highly recommended that you change it immediately!
popupCompromisedDescription.description: Content of the compromised password alert in the popup

popupManualPasswordCheckInputPlaceholder.description: The placeholder text in the manual input field

popupManualPasswordCompromised.description: The text displayed when a manually checked password is compromised

popupManualPasswordNotCompromised.description: The text displayed when a manually checked password is NOT compromised

popupManualCheckButton.description: The text of the manual check button

optionsDisableNotificationsHelp.message: This will completely disable notifications, except the toolbar badge

optionsDisableAutocheckOnBlurHelp.message: This will prevent the extension from checking your password after you leave the input field

optionsDisableAutocheckOnIdleHelp.message: This will prevent the extension from checking your password after you stop typing

optionsDelayAutocheckOnIdleHelp.message: Number of milliseconds to wait before autochecking after you stop typing

optionsSaveButton.description: The text displayed on the options save button

optionsSaved.description: The text displayed when options were saved

optionsSaveError.message: There was an error saving the options
optionsSaveError.description: The text displayed when an error occurred saving options
